did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of a 2-page letter, ALS.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Thomas Stearns Eliot Collection, Accession #6247-i, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased from David Schulson Autographs, on June 7, 1989.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a 2-page letter from T. S. Eliot("Tom") to Meg [Nason]. Eliot expresses his appreciation and thankfulness for a cake made for him by Meg which he shared with his cousins and office staff.
